item.title: Tunneling Chrome tabs via SSH
item.description: The problem: you want to tunnel the traffic for only certain browser tabs over SSH because your work restricts access… or you're doing something dodgy. I don't know, and I don't judge. The solution: get another job. The real solution: do this instead. Assumptions: You are running a Unix-like OS and have already configured a working SSH connection to your target host of choice. If not, go here. Install Proxy Switchy Omega in Chrome from the Chrome Web Store.
